argument.name: lastname|N
argument.description: Optional. Default = NULL. Bitmaps in the current database. The following values are possible.

item.name: 512 = Alpha Anywhere internal bitmaps (used for toolbars and menus).

page.description: Returns the name of the next saved Custom Bitmap in the current database.
page.discussion: The A5.BITMAP_ENUM() method returns a CR-LF delimited list of bitmaps.
